name: Rooted Abyss
description:
Our submission for the Global Game Jam 2023 made in 48hours.

Game Controls:
WASD - Move
Left-Click - Interact

Rooted Abyss is a simple, low-poly puzzle game in which the player must figure out how to get off the small island. There is no quit game functionality or restart. Press Esc Key to exit webgl.
